AccessTokenAuth.description: Access token retrieved from token endpoint

timestamp.description: dateTime when gateway device was last updated

code.description: error code describing what went wrong

timestamp.description: dateTime when gateway device was last updated

path.description: The path of the value that has to be changed (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6901)

enabled.description: Whether or not the holiday mode is enabled

startDate.description: The startDate of the holiday mode

endDate.description: The endDate of the holiday mode

scheduleId.description: The id of the current schedule

enabled.description: Whether the current schedule should be enabled or disabled

role.description: The role of the user who did the request

location.description: The location details of the site

placeID.description: An Azure maps place ID for the (sub)municipality

level.description: The level of preciseness of a location

users.description: The users that are linked to a site

deviceModel.description: The model of the gateway device

embeddedId.description: The id of the embedded device, this id can contain a number or a string.

managementPointType.description: The type of a management point

managementPointSubType.description: The sub type of a management point

managementPointCategory.description: The category of a management point

settable.description: Whether or not the characteristic can be changed by the user

deprecated.description: Whether or not the characteristic is deprecated

value.description: The string value of this characteristic

maxLength.description: The max length of the characteristic

value.description: The selected value of the StringArray characteristic. Should be part of the values as well.

values.description: The values allowed in this characteristic

value.description: The detail of this object can be found in the JSON schemas

get.description: This API endpoint is deprecated and will be unavailable by 1 January 2026

get.summary: Get all the sites related to the user.
get.description: With all linked gateway device ids

get.summary: Get an array of gatewayDevices related to the user
get.description: With all related management points and characteristics

get.summary: Get the gatewayDevice and all its management points

parameters.description: The id of the gatewayDevice to which the managementPoint belongs

Not found

error codes:

  * SITE_MISSING
